languages.text: "Всегда к услугам Лорд-капитана. Однако великодушие тут не при чем. Считай, что так я пытаюсь избавить себя в будущем от неприятной лишней работы".
"I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."
languages.original_text: "Всегда к услугам Лорд-капитана. Однако великодушие тут не при чем. Считай, что так я пытаюсь избавить себя в будущем от неприятной лишней работы".

traits.locale_text: "Always at the Lord Captain's service. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Think of it as me trying to avoid unnecessary and unpleasant work down the line."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Always at the Lord Captain's service. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Think of it as me trying to avoid unnecessary and unpleasant work down the line."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am always at the Lord Captain's service. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to avoid unnecessary and unpleasant work in the future."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am always at the Lord Captain's service. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to avoid unnecessary and unpleasant work in the future."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Actúo al servicio de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán, como siempre. Sin embargo, no es una cuestión de magnanimidad. Considérelo un intento por evitarme un trabajo tan innecesario como desagradable en el futuro».
languages.original_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."

traits.locale_text: «Siempre actúo al servicio de{mf|l| la} Lord Capitán. Sin embargo, no es una cuestión de magnanimidad. Considérelo un intento por evitarme un trabajo tan innecesario como desagradable en el futuro».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: “我始终愿意为舰长大人效劳，但这与‘宽宏大量’无关。就当我是在努力解决今后的麻烦，努力避免毫无必要的恼人工作吧。”
languages.original_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."

traits.locale_text: “我始终愿意为舰长大人效劳，但这与‘宽宏大量’无关。就当我是在努力解决今后的麻烦，努力避免毫无必要的恼人工作吧。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Je reste au service {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}, comme toujours. La magnanimité n'a rien à voir là-dedans. Voyez cela comme ma façon d'éviter quelque chose de déplaisant et d'évitable. »
languages.original_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."

traits.locale_text: « Je reste au service {mf|du seigneur-capitaine|de la seigneure-capitaine}. La magnanimité n'a rien à voir là-dedans. Voyez cela comme une façon d'éviter quelque chose de déplaisant à l'avenir. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「俺は常にロード・キャプテンに仕えている。しかし、寛容さはそれとは別だ。これは、不必要で不快な仕事を避けるための試みだと思ってもらっても構わない」
languages.original_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."

traits.locale_text: 「俺は常にロード・キャプテンに仕えている。しかし、寛容さはそれとは別だ。これは、不必要で不快な仕事を避けるための試みだと思ってもらっても構わない」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Ich stehe dem Lord Captain zu Diensten, wie ich es immer tue. Großzügigkeit jedoch hat damit nichts zu tun. Betrachtet das als meinen Versuch, mir eine unnötige und unerfreuliche Aufgabe zu ersparen."
languages.original_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."

traits.locale_text: "Ich stehe dem Lord Captain stets zu Diensten. Aber Großzügigkeit hat damit nichts zu tun. Betrachtet das als meinen Versuch, unnötige und unerfreuliche Arbeit in der Zukunft zu vermeiden."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Her zamanki gibi Lord Kaptan'ın emrinde olacağım. Ancak bunu yüce gönüllülüğümden yapmıyorum. Kendimi gereksiz ve hoş olmayan bir görevden kurtarmak için yapıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I am at the Lord Captain's service, as always. However, magnanimity has nothing to do with it. Consider this my attempt to spare myself an unnecessary and unpleasant task."

traits.locale_text: "Her zamanki gibi Lord Kaptan'ın emrinde olacağım. Ancak bunu yüce gönüllülüğümden yapmıyorum. Kendimi gereksiz ve hoş olmayan bir görevden kurtarmak için yapıyorum."
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion
